message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm initially offering it for $1,500,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $1,500,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, the value of this product is truly significant. I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000.
I understand the value of the product, but I'm still not willing to pay $1,300,000. I'm willing to pay $1,100,000 for it.
